aboutOurFirmSection.title: about our firm
aboutOurFirmSection.description: As a leading law firm in Ho Chi Minh City, TK & Associates boasts a profound understanding of the intricacies of the Vietnamese legal system. With over 20 years of experience, our firm has successfully navigated a wide range of legal matters for individuals and organizations across Vietnam. Our team of skilled attorneys is dedicated to providing tailored solutions that leverage our deep-rooted knowledge and expertise, ensuring optimal outcomes for our clients.

aboutOurFirmSection.subtitle3: Property law expertise for transactions and disputes

whyUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyUs.subtitle: At TK & Associates, we are dedicated to providing exceptional legal services tailored to your unique needs. Our team of skilled attorneys offers a comprehensive range of legal expertise, from civil disputes to court representation and beyond. We are committed to delivering personalized attention, results-driven solutions, and affordable legal representation. Our approach is centered on building strong relationships with our clients, understanding their goals, and working tirelessly to achieve the best possible outcomes.

points.description: We have a long history of success and client satisfaction.

cookiesPolicy.title: Cookies Policy
cookiesPolicy.introduction: This Cookies Policy explains how we use cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our website, including any other media form, media channel, mobile website, or mobile application related or connected thereto.

whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small data files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently, as well as to provide information to the owners of the site.

howWeUseCookies.content: We use cookies for several reasons, including: to improve user experience, to analyze how our website is used, and to deliver personalized content. Below is a list of the cookies we use on our site:

cookiesList.essential: Essential Cookies: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems.
cookiesList.analytics: Analytics Cookies: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website, allowing us to improve the user experience.
cookiesList.advertising: Advertising Cookies: These cookies are used to deliver advertisements that are relevant to you and your interests.

yourChoices.content: You can choose to accept or decline cookies. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify your browser setting to decline cookies if you prefer.

changesToPolicy.content: We may update our Cookies Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Cookies Policy on this page.

contact.content: If you have any questions about our Cookies Policy, please contact us at [email@example.com].

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: Your privacy is important to us. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information.

informationCollection.content: We collect information from you when you visit our site, register on our site, or interact with us in other ways. This may include personal information such as your name, email address, and phone number.

howWeUseYourInformation.content: We use the information we collect to improve our website, enhance customer service, and send periodic emails regarding your order or other products and services.

informationProtection.content: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. Your information is stored on secure networks and is only accessible by a limited number of persons who have special access rights.

yourRights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can request to view the information we hold about you.

changesToPrivacyPolicy.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you about significant changes in the way we treat personal information by sending a notice to the primary email address specified in your account.

contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at our provided email address.

termsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
termsOfUse.introduction: Welcome to our website. By accessing or using our services, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions.

userObligations.content: As a user, you agree to use the website in accordance with applicable laws and regulations. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information.

intellectualProperty.content: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of our company and is protected by copyright laws.

limitationOfLiability.content: We shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from your use of this website.

modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on the website.

contact.content: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us at support@example.com.

faqs.question: What should I expect during my first consultation?
faqs.answer: We will discuss your legal needs, outline potential strategies, and provide an overview of our fees.

faqs.question: How do you charge for your services?
faqs.answer: We offer a variety of billing options, including flat fees and hourly rates, depending on the type of case.
